title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.
author: Jen Lennon

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: Chris Meloni Joins, William H. Macy Circling Hulu’s NFL Drama From Dan Fogelman
description: Two big names are preparing to hit the gridiron for Hulu. Chris Meloni will play the head coach of an NFL team in an upcoming Hulu drama from This Is Us creator Dan Fogelman, TVLine has confirmed. Additionally, Shameless alum William H. Macy is in talks to join the series — tentatively titled 17 Sundays — as […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Washington Black’s Sterling K. Brown and Ernest Kingsley Junior Revel in the ‘Brotherhood and Mentorship’ Hulu’s Historical Drama Gave Them
description: In Hulu’s Washington Black, Sterling K. Brown’s Medwin Harris takes the titular young man played by Ernest Kingsley Junior on as a protege in 1800s Halifax, Nova Scotia. Washington, aka “Wash,” is an escaped slave with a penchant for science and engineering. Medwin is a savvy operator in an enclave for those who’ve escaped enslavement […]
author: Kimberly Roots
